ActJudges Act
SubjectBarbara Hinkson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Ernest Edward Hinkson
PrecisGranting of an annuity to BARBARA HINKSON, widow of the Hon. Ernest Edward Hinkson, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective September 7, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Barbara Hinkson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Ernest Edward Hinkson
precis: Granting of an annuity to BARBARA HINKSON, widow of the Hon. Ernest Edward Hinkson, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective September 7, 2010.
